title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS: The Enterprise Standard for AI-Driven Workflows (AIM283)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - ServiceNow + AWS:企业级AI驱动工作流的标准 (AIM283)
abstract: ServiceNow and AWS are redefining what’s possible when intelligence meets scale. Together, we deliver AI-driven workflows with built-in trust, compliance, and performance—on the cloud designed for the enterprise. See how ServiceNow’s AI Agent Fabric, Control Tower, and Vault integrate with AWS Bedrock, SageMaker, and Security Hub to create a foundation for governed, intelligent automation at scale. Real stories from DXC reveal how organizations accelerate innovation, cut costs, and build the future of work with ServiceNow and AWS. This presentation is brought to you by ServiceNow, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: ServiceNow 和 AWS 正在重新定义智能与规模结合的可能性。我们共同提供具有内置信任、合规性和性能的 AI 驱动工作流——基于为企业设计的云平台。了解 ServiceNow 的 AI Agent Fabric、Control Tower 和 Vault 如何与 AWS Bedrock、SageMaker 和 Security Hub 集成，为大规模的受治理智能自动化创建基础。来自 DXC 的真实案例揭示了组织如何通过 ServiceNow 和 AWS 加速创新、降低成本并构建未来的工作方式。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 ServiceNow 提供。

presenter.name: Courtney McShane
presenter.title: AVP, Global Head of AWS Business, ServiceNow
